data.title: Test Writing a New Article with Lots of Special Characters "\'`
data.subtitle: Just Test Writing a New Article with Lots of Special Characters "\'`
data.html:
Hello there! I'm trying to "write" a special article with a lot of \\ weird characters. I hope it's going well //. | ddu ddu ddudududududu

Here's some experience for writing an article.

You can add images to your article by clicking on the media icon on the toolbar. It's the one on right side.

Try it out and add images from your computer like this:


Looking good!

But then, "how about video?" you asked.

Well, don't worry.

Try using the Insert Media button again, and now paste a link to the video into the link field. Like this:

Sweet, yeah!

You can add a youtube and vimeo videos. But our lovely kominfo still blocking vimeo, so for now just going with a youtube video will be safe for us all.

Also, you can upload your own video directly from your computer using the Insert Media button. Try it out!

For now, we support uploading videos for *.mp4, *.webm, and *.ogv files because unfortunately some browsers doesn't support a wide variety of video files.

Alright, that's it then.

Try it out yourself and tell me how's the experience on writing an article.

Let me know if you have some feedback.
